content.question: A cart traveling along a straight track accelerates from an initial velocity of <math alttext="6 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>6</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></mstyle></math>. The graph shows the cartâ€™s acceleration <math alttext="a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>a</mi></math> as a function of time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math>. What is the displacement of the cart in meters as a function of <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="one third, times t cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>
<math alttext="4 times t squared, plus 6, t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>t</mi></math>
<math alttext="one third times t cubed, plus 6, t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>t</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="one third times t cubed, plus 6, t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>t</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
